name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky
description: Runs the DX8 version by default.
notes:
After GOG installer finishes, some error messages will show up. You can ignore them.

The intro video might not work, but you can skip through it or disable it with the Config.exe

The DX9 version may have menu scaling issues at higher resolutions unless you disable "High-Res Assets" in the config.

script.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Legend of Heroes - Trails in the Sky/ed6_win.exe

task.description: Running config tool for first time launch...
task.executable: C:/GOG Games/The Legend of Heroes - Trails in the Sky/Config.exe
task.name: wineexec

content:
exe: drive_c/GOG Games/The Legend of Heroes - Trails in the Sky/ed6_win.exe
files:
- gog: N/A:Select the Windows GOG installer
game:
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: Creating Wine prefix...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    executable: gog
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: quartz
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: amstream
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dsound
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: gdiplus
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: xvid
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Running config tool for first time launch...
    executable: C:/GOG Games/The Legend of Heroes - Trails in the Sky/Config.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
